sentences.sContent: There is no target date for completion of the new project.
sentences.sCn: 这个新的项目何时完工没有预定日期。

sentences.sContent: The government may fail to meet (= achieve ) its target of recycling 25% of domestic waste.
sentences.sCn: 政府可能达不到回收利用25%的生活垃圾的目标。

sentences.sContent: Jiang set annual growth targets of 8–9%.
sentences.sCn: 江确定了8%至9%的年增长目标。

phrases.pCn: 到达目标上空；正追踪目标；切题，切中要害
目的语；目标语言；译入语
目标检测；目标探测；目标觉察
目标受众；目标观众；目标客户
n. 目标位置，目标定位；目标搜索

remMethod.val: tar(音似： 她)+get(得到)→得到她是我的目标→目标

trans.tranOther: something that you are trying to achieve, such as a total, an amount, or a time

trans.tranCn: 把……作为目标；规定……的指标；瞄准某物
trans.tranOther: to make something have an effect on a particular limited group or area
